list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They splashed about, ducking each other in the pool.

list_definition.definition: to lower the head suddenly as if to avoid a blow

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He ducked as the ball came at him.

list_definition.definition: a female duck. See also drake.
in cricket, a score of nil by a batsman

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was out for a duck.
